name: EnviroDIY_ModularSensors
description: A library that allows acces to multiple sensors through a unified interface.  This allows the user to simply access many sensors to log the data or send the data to data repositories like the EnviroDIY data portal.
keywords: sensor, modular, sensors, logger, low power, sleeping, EnviroDIY

dependencies.name: EnviroDIY_DS3231
dependencies.note: An Arduino library for the DS3231 RTC (Real Time Clock), based off of the Sodaq_DS3231 library.

dependencies.name: EnableInterrupt
dependencies.note: GreyGnome's EnableInterrupt - Assign an interrupt to any supported pin on all Arduinos

dependencies.name: SdFat
dependencies.note: SdFat - FAT16/FAT32 file system for SD cards.

dependencies.name: Adafruit ADS1X15
dependencies.note: TI ADS1X15 ADC Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: DHT sensor library
dependencies.note: AOSong DHT Sensor Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: Adafruit AM2315
dependencies.note: AOSong AM2315 I2C Temp/Humidity Sensor Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: Adafruit BME280 Library
dependencies.note: Bosch BME280 Temp/Humidity/Pressure Sensor Library by Adafruit

dependencies.name: OneWire
dependencies.note: OneWire - Control 1-Wire protocol (DS18S20, DS18B20, DS2408 and etc)

dependencies.name: DallasTemperature
dependencies.note: DallasTemperature - Arduino Library for Dallas Temperature ICs (DS18B20, DS18S20, DS1822, DS1820)

dependencies.name: EnviroDIY_SDI12_ExtInts
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY SDI-12 Library, dependent on external library for interrupts

dependencies.name: TinyGSM
dependencies.note: A small Arduino library for GPRS modules.

dependencies.name: SensorModbusMaster
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY SensorModbusMaster - Arduino library for communicating via modbus with the Arduino acting as master.

dependencies.name: YosemitechModbus
dependencies.note: Arduino library for communication with Yosemitech sensors via Modbus.

dependencies.name: RTCZero
dependencies.note: Functions for using the processor real time clock in SAMD21 processors
